ModMetaData.name: Jelano retexture - Factional War
ModMetaData.author: Jelano
ModMetaData.description:
The Jelano retexture series aims to improve textures both from the original game and from community mods.
This mod retextures the UI from the popular "Factional War" mod by Shadowrabbit. I made sites images on the world map more minimalistic.
I would appreciate your support on Patreon. Have a good day
